entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
